resources.string: In order for TeleFender to function properly, we just need you to allow a couple permissions.

Setting TeleFender as the default dialer app will allow the app to make and receive calls just like the default phone app. Essentially, we\'re replacing the default phone app. Consequently, we will also be able to access your contacts and call logs. Don\'t worry though, you can always switch back to the default phone app by entering the default phone app or deleting TeleFender.

Allowing TeleFender to have the Do Not Disturb permission makes it possible for the app to actually silence any unwanted calls (if you so choose).\n\nWhen you press the \"Allow Do Not Disturb\" button, you will be redirected to the Settings app. There, you should scroll down until you see "TeleFender", where you can then toggle on / off the Do Not Disturb permission.
After you allow both permissions, go ahead and press Continue!
We just sent a verification code to your number.
We\'ll need your number to get started.
To use TeleFender, you need to accept our privacy policy.\n\nIf you have any additional concerns about our privacy policy, please contact us for more information.

In order for TeleFender to silence any unwanted calls we will need the Do Not Disturb permission.

When you press the "Allow Do Not Disturb" button, you will be redirected to the Settings app. There, you should scroll down until you see "TeleFender", where you can then toggle on / off the Do Not Disturb permission.

Once you've granted the permission, you will be able to select the "Silence" mode.
Incoming and active phone notification channel
High-priority notification to show incoming and active calls
